title: Kodak Movie Light and two bulbs
brief_description: “Kodak Movie light 220 x 140V 1000W V/XS/200 label on reverse says: do not earth. double insulation. On and Off switch: 250V A.C. only. ELMACO Australian plug: Peaston, 250V 7.5A V/A50/1 Two - Philips Photolita bulbs in their original boxes. Photolita* trademark PF218E 43 Photolita - NM 250V 500W C8 Made in Holland With one instruction pamphlet which has guide numbers of the exposure times.”

details.label: Measurements
display_values: Arms are adjustable. When at right angles to each side: 265 x 565 x 123 mm. When arms are brought in to minimum: 265 x 125 x 123 mm. cord length from base of light to tip of plug: 2600 mm Bulb: 150mm x 110 x 110 mm (each) original box: 163 x 118 x 120 mm Instruction booklet: 147 x 137 mm
